question: How many Female assistant referee's are selected for the first time in FIFA men's competition?
explanation: FIFA has selected 7 female support referees, for the first time for a men's tournament. They will work along with 70 male referees to officiate the 52 matches in the FIFA U-17 World Cup. The FIFA U-17 World Cup is to be played in six Indian cities from 6th October to 28th October, 2017.
